item.title: perl-Dancer2-0.200000-1.fc23.noarch
item.description:
perl-Dancer2 - Lightweight yet powerful web application framework

Dancer2 is the new generation of Dancer, the lightweight web-framework for
Perl. Dancer2 is a complete rewrite based on Moo.
